nodes.text: The Raider was a GS-100 salvage ship captained by the Twi'lek scavenger Ratch. In the aftermath of the Battle of Sullust during the Clone Wars, it recovered Asajj Ventress's Ginivex-class fanblade starfighter and her unconscious inside it. After Ratch refused her request to transport her to Dathomir, she killed him and his crew, and flew the ship herself.
The ship's nose art featured a Tusken Raider with the Aurebesh lettering "Raider" on the side of the vessel.
The Raider's model is reused from the model of Vulture's Claw from Season One of The Clone Wars, but with a distinct paintjob and other modifications.
